scenes.background: You expressed doubt about the urgency and suggested a structural change. [Monica] and [Bob] seem taken aback but continue the discussion with a sense of urgency. [Bob] looks frustrated as he types his response.
scenes.description: 'I get your point about team structure, but we need an immediate solution. Can't you at least help us this one last time while we figure things out?'

options.text: I understand your urgency. Let's brainstorm solutions together for a few minutes.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency and suggested a short collaborative session, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, motivation to directly resolve the issue was lower.

options.text: I can help out briefly, but I still need to maintain my break. Maybe we can find a middle ground?
options.analysis: You offered a compromise, displaying good social skills and emotional balance. However, motivation and self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I find it hard to believe there's no one else who can handle this. Maybe our planning needs an overhaul.
options.analysis: You expressed doubt about the urgency and suggested an overhaul, showing good emotional control and motivation. However, empathy and emotional perception were lacking.
